nodes.title: Add withAnyParams() method to request to optionally disable querystring validation.
Add a default user agent header to server driver request
New Constructor on ClientDriverRequest & Matcher now uses two ClientDriverRequests
Added in support for HEAD request to rest server driver
Added in support for HEAD HTTP header in rest client driver as per Issue #20
Fix NPE i toString for HttpRealRequest #168
chore: fixes headers in the README.md
Restore support for Jetty 9.2, and thus Java 7
Feature: stream support for client driver response handling
Allow any HTTP Method to be used
Propagate new methods into ClientDriver and Rule
Match header names, not just values
Add option to turn off fail fast for unexp. req.
Improve output on failing expectations and unexpected requests
Check that the port is actually set
Make the listening port available in JUnit rule
Reset expectations so ClientDriver can be reused
Let Jetty find a free port by itself
Binding all the interfaces in localhost while starting jetty
Let Jetty self find a free port
New Body Capture for more efficient waitFor
Capture body after remove from expectations list
Added methods to set a customized ClientConnectionManager and HttpParams
Add withHeaders to ClientDriverRequest to allow chaining.
Allow implicit setting of .within against ClientDriverResponse via ClientDriverRule
Allow Body content to be captured when both query-string & form params are provided
Headers in HttpResponse could be ignored.
Problem running "mvn test" with locale sv_SE.UTF-8 (guess).
Add link to Ben's Clojure wrapper
Support for binary responses in ClientDriverResponse
Move introduction and getting started docs from wiki to README.md
Include *all* unexpected requests when reporting failure
Add support for matching of concurrent requests
Fix parsing of request Content Types that include a charset
